original_text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, and walked in the ways of David his father, and declined neither to the right hand, nor to the left.
korean_text: 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하여 그의 조상 다윗의 길로 걸으며 좌우로 치우치지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 주의 보시기에 옳은 것을 행하였으며

sentences.original_text: and walked in the ways of David his father
and declined neither to the right hand, nor to the left
